values: mmm i always expect the unexpected but never have i ever unexpected the expected. I expected to be single on the 6th. i expected to wake up the next morning after a horrible night's sleep and come to the realization one more time. i did not expect how hard it would hit. i did not expect to be so angry and bitter. i did not expect to try to ignore it because i really didn't want it. and i didn't expect everything to remind me of him like it does in movies. seriously, this world is fucked up and every song on the radio and every t.v. show and movie on t.v. and everyeveryEVERYTHING makes me reminisce. "everybody wang chung tonight" was playing in the store today. fuck. Listerine was on sale today. fuck. one of the categories on Jeopardy was "grateful dead" today. fuck. one of the clues on wheel of fortune today was "the green mountains of Vermont." fuck. Never have i ever been this deep in denial and regret, never have i ever hated being mature this much. It's okay to just be best friends with someone you love, but it's not that easy when you're in love with them. I want to go to bed until I get to go to college.

wellll i woke up at 5 today to go on the AIDS walk, then fell back asleep and woke up again at 7--so i didnt go i was really pissed...but i went to brunch and ate a waffle and hung out with Jolly then i went to my room and i stole a package for me that was in the bag and its been there forever and i was in a semi-bad mood for various reasons so i just took the stupid thig and got an amazing present from my parents...hurray! and umm...i love you brYan and miss you ooooodles and buckets and tons!
ok gotta go im making tshirts for the entire freaking school
muah love you bryan hurry home

ok so this makes me upset: the flight to florida didnt get us in till 3 am...we were sposed to get in at 7:00 pm the previous night...whatever... this makes me happy:
You are Belle from Beauty and the Beast!

What Disney Princess are you?
brought to you by Quizilla yeah. thats right. so anyways, im good i went shopping today and bought 4 new pairs of pants (pink cordorouys, orange stretchy sweatpant things, 2 jeans) anyhoo it was fun and nice to be home. i saw my puppy cocoa!!!!! my grandmas taking care of her and so shes still in florida. thasnksgiving was good i ate a lot...not really thats a lie...and then tonight i watched mean girls with my parents because my dad hadnt seen it, wanted to, etc...yeah ok thats all! i miss brYan. so much. its unbearable. two more days. i can do it....

okay
so today was interesting...i had a panic attack in western civ and went into hysterics...i was laughing and crying at yelling at people and it was so bad...i dont know what the fuck was wrong with me but im glad its over because now that ive been pushed over the edge nothing's really bothering me. i had my crazy vulnerable spazmatic morning and now i'm just like....i dont know...post-earthquake i guess. im sort of still feeling vulnerable and i also slapped brYan in the face today for absolutely no reason and im still obviously slightly insane but by tomorrow morning i'm sure ill be back to normal, whatever the fuck that is. no, i'll be better tha normal because now i know what's going on in my head. i sdont know how to fix it, but i know that stuff exists in it and im prepared to get over it. hoorah. these are my goals:
1. no more buying stupid magazines (only vanity fair and national geographic)
2. no more fakeness
3. drink a lot of water (start carrying a nalgene around, i have two and im not sure why i dont use them)
4. stop worrying about stupid things like how i look
5. set realistic expetations for myself
6. have more alone time
7. play my bass more (ive been neglecting my baby!)
8. get over my stage fright
9. focus more on my schoolwork
there are probably more but i dunno these are the first that come to mind. im not really expecting to achieve them too soon they're just sort of general.
aaaaaah (that was a sigh of relief.)
okay i'm done stick a fork in me.

SOoo...not much is happening--
i [and my mother] picked up Brendan at Grand Central yesterday and spent the day in NYC...went to madame tussaud's wax meuseum and got our pictures taken with jimi hendrix and the beatles and whatnot--great fun, great fun...anyways, and we came back here and ordered pizza and watched the olympics [the opening ceremony was kind of weird towards the end...] and then at around 11:00 decided we should watch Billy Madison...because we just wanted to or something...so that hapened and i was high on sugar then i ran out of energy and we went to bed...woke up this morning, made lots of experimental french toast and finally mastered the art of making it and stuff...it was super-yummy. THEN since Brendan didnt bring his guitar [which is okay because then we would have had to carry it around NY anyways...] he tried out my bass...he gave up fast...but thats okay! and so we listened to music for a while and then my parents got home from shopping for fruit or something...and we were all prepared to see Collateral at 2:00 but they got back at 2:15 so we waited till the 4:10 showing of it...well i thought it was 4:1- but it was really 4:40 so we had to wait around again for a while..we wandered around the strip mall...great fun great fun...then we came home and played some pool and then i had to do something else so my dad and brendan had some nice rivalry goin on...anyways i have to go to dinner!

OMG yay!!! i'm home! camp was fucking awesome though. i LOVED it as usual. shut up i'm a dork. anyways this could be a long entry...so the first week [which wasnt even a full week] i went on a mountain-biking overnight and it was awesome...there was a hole in our tent...and it was pouring for like 10 hours straight...but it was okay...haha no i lie...it was amazing! but it hurt my ass and crotch a lot...i hadnt been on a bike since i was 8 and then it was like "so lets go up/down this super steep rocky thing.." yay! but i  loved it SO much...and then i went horseback riding...but it was more of a "i forgot how to saddle a horse...re-teach me" sort of day...and then we had playday with the boys and it was fun; i made friends! yay! and the 2nd week [which wAS a full week] i did...umm let me remember...i think i went hiking then did indian crafts with this woman called Neeko Strangeowl and she told us stories and made us chokecherry pudding, frybread, and buffalo stew [it was SO yummy]...and um then i went hiking for almost the whole rest of thw week but i went riding one day...the day that the barns flooded...we built dams and cleaned it up. it was grand. then we went riding for a bit [i had rembrandt--and i cantered for the first time in a LONG time and it was super fun]...! and sunday was all-camp-campfire and i saw my cousin, and we did an amazing skit...haha it rocked my socks...and i made some MORE friends with the boys... and then 3rd week i did lots of hiking...i did an EB [early breakfast hike]...we woke up at like 1:30 ish to hike meeker mountain--the 2nd highest peak in rocky mountain national park...it was gorgeous and there was lots of boulder hopping and it was SO fun but it killed my knees...i got a picture of the sunrise from chasm lake---at the bottom of longs peak [the highest peak in the park]...so gorgeous! so so so so beautiful you have no idea!! omg...it almost made me cry...also becuase it was almost the end of camp...and there was the wiffle ball tournament between all the counselors [bte against gte] and bte won...but then charlotte and i sang the national anthem and it was like a last minute thing and she did pretty harmony with it and whatnot then mallory [counselor] goes, "can you sing that for horseshow?" cuz its a big deal ands whatnot...at the flag-raising aND stuff...so we agreed to...then 4th week i went camping and thephoto guy came and brought us ice cream [randomness...] so we ate it and elise and i wrote this slightly disturbing and inappropriate story and she made the photo guy [jd] read it and he was scarred for life...it was funny...and ummmmmm then i went riding the next day and there was this horse skippy who was a stubborn piece of crap [but he was SO cute] and so i kinda whipped him into shape and he finally listened to me and i got him to stop cutting corners and he finally cantered with his head up! yay! then i tried to canter Blue [ a super lazy horse] and he wouldnt and hes really fat and i was kicking him a lot and he just kept walking and my groin still hurts from that...umm....yeah then it was horseshow practice and bte came over and we had a mini-dance party ish thing...and then friday was horseshow ans i got second place for poles and sonnet and elmo got their RP's so they were in the drill...and charlotte and i sang the national anthem [i'm really proud of it...it went really well and the harmony was super-pretty!] and then charlotte, dana and i did a really pretty three part harmony to amazing grace for the flag lowering....and it was pretty! and then saturday night was banquet and we all sobbed and shae and i cried every time we saw eachthother...and we sang "i hope tomorrow is like today" by guster and i sobbed...and then it was recognition night and we all got to find out how many miles we hiked over the term...i hiked like 60 which is not too great but im still happy because i did a lot of other stuff...and shae got her driver [its hard to explain...its like a citizenship award type thing but it means a lottttttt] and i cried for her...it was awsome...and then sunday was final chapel and last day and stuff and we found out laura wasnt coming back next year god that was sad...then we all started laughing because we remembered this time with bubblegum....um yeah... and then i stayed up all night to say goodbye to people and we watched shrek and the goddamn lizzy mcguire movie [it was soooo dumb]. anyways and it was fun and we all cuddled then i left to catch my flight at like 6 am. the end! and then i got back and read cosmo and had a chicken caesar salad [ i was craving one soooo much!!!!] and shocolate and crap and then i took a really long shower and then i played bass and here i am!
yay!
its sooo good to be back!
I can tie a cherry stem in a knot with my tongue! i discovered this today! woohoo! i win. the end. muahaha. thats all

so i'm a little confused..for absolutely no reason...i had a sort of blah-ish day...went to a farmers market to get blueberries and raspberries to make a pie tomorrow...and then i went and got movies...and sex and the city...i feel a little blah still...i need to talk to friends...i mean im talking to joe but i need to talk to a girl i think...*sigh* i wonder if alex is home...the time difference is good; i may be able to catch her in between dance lessons...whatever...im so weird right now i feel all weird and i dont have a headache but i feel like i'm going to get one...i think i need sleep...i didnt fall asleep till 4 this morning and i woke up..well my mom woke me up...at like 8:30 or somthing...i need more sleeeeeeep!!!!! blaaaah! i need a hug...really badly...*sniff* thats all...
yay! i took pics of the inside of a kaleidoscope theyre fun fun fun....woo hoo
[need a hug]
and will someone leave me a fucking comment? i feel sort of *unloved*

I'm st that really weird point where i haven't cried in a really long time and i just need to--for absolutely no reason...and almost anything slightly sad could make me cry right now...gaah i hate when im feeling all fragile and shit...*sigh* whatever. I had a great day, though! i made a friend, sophie, who lives two houses down...theres a drumset in her basement and im "free to use it whenever i feel like it" score! until i get my own ill just use her dad's. woohoo. and i'm going to play music with her and her mom & dad because they're uber-musical which makes me happy. and she can sing, which also makes me happy. she has a nice voice, hits all the high notes, nice and clear, smooth--i like it. we just sat around and talked for a while then went to her house and kind of did the same--and played pianowith eachother and sang and whatnot. it was fun. we'll do it again soon.
i'm going to go watch beauty and the beast to get the tears going.
*sigh*

woo hoo ! i actually have something to DO tomorrow! i'm meeting this girl sophie who's dad is some mr. big guy in the music world which is good because he's gonna find me a good bass teacher yay. i'm so excited im gonna meet someone in my neighborhood! and then she will introduce me to other people in my neighborhood! which makes me slightly less loser-ish which is *wonderful*! im very happy right now. i'm running on adrenaline and sugar and its fabulous. i'm a little bored but its not the normal boredom that i usually experience...because its not the kind where theres stuff to do and i just dont want to do it, its the kind where ive already done all the things that couldve been done and now im just all fidgety and like "blaah!" because i need something else to do....anyways...i cant fnd my shoes; that makes me sad becasue they were really comfortable and they made me slightly taller which is always a plus...*sigh* i miss everyone--and im getting more and more bored by the second...i better figure out something to do...i already watched movies...im not hungry so i cant really eat...i played bass for like 4 hours straight today...it was superfun!...and i read a book AND i cleaned my room...and i watched some tv which sucked...hmm...what else did i do? i played with my dog; the water was too cold today to go swimming...so i didnt do that...i got bored earlier so i did some crunches...i made soup for lunch and had two smoothies today...i did the dishes for my "poor tired mother" and i found my drumsticks which was fun; now i need a drumset...ive felt like playing the drums for such a long time i think im just going to get a drumset in a few days...which would be SO nice...it would make me [in the words of wes,] UBER-happy. i'm also learning guitar, so i might need one of those...and  a keyboard...i wonder if sophie's house is full of instruments because her dad is such a music guy...? i know they have saxophones becase he plays the saxophone [i played for a year...i got bored and went back to drums...] okay now im rambling sorry! i'm done i swear!
*sigh* the end!!!!!
really!
i promise!

i had a rather uneventful day...cleaned my room, watched fahrenheit 9/11 and lvoed it. wow it was amazing but i was freezing in the theater which kind of sucked. but i got popcorn and put lots of extra butter on it because ive been deprived of junk food for the past month [its okay ive become addicted to strawberries and blueberries and whatnot instead...so im good...] anyways and thats about it then i came home and hung lights up in my room...and made my bed for the first time in like a week [whats the point? im just going to mess it up againwhen i go to bed...] whatever. my dog went insane because she heard fireworks and got all scared and shit...shes such a wimp it disappoints me...you'd think i would've raised her better than that. ah well...somethings in my eye and its bothering me and i look like a spaz because im 
blinking really hard and randomly andi was kind of poking at my eye a second ago...if anyone looked tnrough the window theyd think i was ill...oh well i probably am...anyways so thats pretty much it, i also found old pictures and i was shocked at how much ive changed, in terms of looks...it was a scary realization...also how much different my friends look...*weirdness*.
thats all
oye...

okay..so we [johanna and i] were in the bathroom and she whips out her supercool japanese camera and *CLICK* my expression of "johanna, if you even think about..." is captured. and here it is. then there's the next, more planned picture: since its planned i look like crap. or something close to it. i dunno. i hate my planned smile. and my nose looks like a pelican in this one. haha i look like i have rabies. and johanna looks like some sort of small furry animal. and nicole just looks stunned or something. [DEER IN HEADLIGHTS]. AND for BrYan, this is my stomach from spring break. im not holding my shirt up even though it looks like it. its tied up and im probably waving but my friend decided "oh ill just zoom in over here..." so there...

 

The End!!

i want it! i love dobermans...buy me one and ill love you forever!!!...however i do love my doglet...shes 11 pounds...which means i weigh 97 pounds more than her. which is SAD. i want a dobermannnnnnnnn...okay im done obsessing. really. anyways so today i finished my room completely, yay, and i am in dire need of a shower so i can get all the paint off of me. but my room makes me *so* happy! I smell like dog--because i had to chase my dog around the yard and then my neighbor [whom i dont know]'s yard because she had a paintbrush, and it was clean thank god so i didnt have to like brush her teeth because they were purple or something...that would have been hell x 2. shes tiny, but shes fast. im tiny and not as fast as her. is that bad? probably not...i dont know many people who have actually caught her in the midst of her wild "im a big tough dog and i'm going to outrun you because i can muahahaha! AND i have your paintbrush!!" moods--but i did today and im proud.
in conclusion, i am going to take a shower.

bah humbug.

my mom and i ordered chinese because we were both too tired to cook...it was yummy and i was worried for a while because there were 4 fortune cookies...my mom took one, and i opened one of the others and there was NO FORTUNE IN IT. what is this world coming to?! so i opened another one, and there was, once again, NO FUCKING FORTUNE. Is that a sign? am i destined to live a boring, empty life? well thats what i thought--when i opened the third cookie...it said, "you will overcome many hardships :) :) :) :) " well yeah...like the one i just experienced? jesus. save me from this fortune-less hellhole...

i forgot to say that i almost  DIED last night--my weird mother nearly burnt the house down. she put bread in the oven and its only sposed to be in there for like 8 minutes and half an hour later she goes "hmm i think ill check on the bread..." and opens the oven and flames come flying out and she goes "oh DEAR!" and goes "greg, (my dad), HELP!!!!!" and so he has to pull the damn tray out of the oven and stick it in the sink and turns the water on and of course the flames get bigger and my mom freaks out and runs away and my dad, the big strong man of the house (not) kind of says something like "oh, shut up..." or something and the flames die...meanwhile, i am watching this with great amusement and laughing at my mother in my head and being thankful that i only got burned by a noodle (i was right by the oven, COOKING the noodles that burned me when this happened...) so yeah.
im alive though, so be happy.

I painted my ceiling so now its the most *beaUtiful* shade of midnight blue...it makes me happy (as many other things do...like mini-slinkies and saying "chartreuse" with emphasis on the "eUse"...never mind...) so i have nothing better to d with my life, and so i end up taking stupid recockulous quizzes. here are the results of my lack of life:

brought to you by Quizilla well then. go me. [i guess i DO like to fight...and laugh a LOT...and i suppose some would say that i am a ball of energy that could explode at any moment...]. my nose is blue from the paint. *sigh* i hate the radio. it plays crap and it plays this crap over and over again--theres like a 4-song list that they play over and over and over again...im going to implode if i hear any of those songs again (but that one by that 13 year old JOJO or what ever...she pisses me off...and makes me want to kill someone...preferably her...she ahs no talent and she should go home because she sucks at life.) sorry im just kind of at a point where i need to be with people that arent my parents...or my dog...theyre all pissing me off...i need one of my friends...like Bryan or Jason or Johanna or Nicole or Brendan or Allie or something... *oye with the poodles already* toodleoo!

WOW!


i just got back from Florida with Johanna and Nicole...and it was FUCKING AWESOME! At first, Jojo was like, "but i dont WANT to go to Disneyworld because im scared of the rollercoasters!!!!!!" and so nicole and i forced her to go on rides...we weaned her, dont worry we arent heartless...

MONDAY:

we started her on Pirates of the Caribbean, then splash Thunder Mountain, then Splash Mountain, then johanna goes, "OOH LETS DO THAT ONE!" and points at Space Mountain...so there ya go. just goes to show that you DO have to face your fears to get over them. well, until the next day...

TUESDAY:

We attempted the impossible: JOhannas biggest fears: falling,being dropped, and heights. Yeah, we made her go on the tower of terror. okay fine we are kind of a tad bit heartless...oops...nicole and i were laughing and smiling the whole time, but johanna gets off, near tears, in shock, and finally goes, "It felt like someone was KILLING me.....[whimper}"
and then nicole and i felt really bad...not really i think i just sort of told her to get over it...oh well...

WEDNSDAY:

we went to the mall and i met the love of my life:
i wanted a cookie, and jo and nicole wanted ice cream. then, since they were still getting ice cream and i was done getting my cookie, i walked over to Edy's to wait with them. well, getting ice cream was NOT written into my schedule, considering i had a huge cookie in my hand...but i look up and see the cutest guy i have EVER seen in my life: he was average height, about sixteen, darkish brown hair, honeyish eyes, braces, the slightest lisp, and tan. and he had straight teeth already so the braces made him cuter...and he had dimples when he smiled--which he did a lot of at me...anyhoo...then i ordered ice cream so i could stare at him longer..and then i for cherries becasue he would have to look for them, stalling, for even more time, and then it was time to pay :( but then...he pretended that he could find pennies, and i saw he had lots, but i looked for them in my wallet anyways and i found them and looked up and he like...looked away...and it was adorable..then we left, and i was sad because as nicole put it, "my heart had been frozen then soft-served to some old man in a waffle cone..." so i turned around, grabbed nicole, and said "i am going to ask for a chocolate ice cream and his phone number." so we marched all the way back, and there was a long line..and it was his first day on the job so he took a while and we were late so we had to go...but he saw us, recognized us, smiled hi adorable smile, and after he saw we were leaving he looked all sad and went into the back room to mop. yay i had an effect on him. or nicole did. or we both did. whatever. the end.
